name: Trollkin Shaman
description: The Trollkin Shaman has thick hide, enhancing its defenses, and is known for robust spellcasting abilities alongside solid melee proficiency, using a staff in combat.
memorable: It has a regeneration ability that allows it to recover health each turn, making it difficult to defeat in battle unless it takes acid or fire damage.
goals: Typically serves as a support and leader for other trollkin, enhancing their abilities in combat.
relations: Often found alongside other trollkin, serving as a strategist and magic user within their ranks.
environment: Commonly found in wooded or marshy areas where trollkin typically dwell.
strengths: High proficiency in spellcasting with strong support capabilities, effective regeneration, and good perception skills.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire and acid damage, significantly hindering its regenerative abilities.
attacks: Utilizes a staff to make multiattacks, dealing moderate bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Inspire Ferocity grants allies advantage on attacks and saving throws and temporary hit points, enhancing their combat effectiveness.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 15, making it adept at noticing hidden threats.
skills: Skilled in perception and maintains average ability in arcana and nature.
additional_information: Spellcasting ability tied to Wisdom, enhancing its spell effectiveness.
Regeneration allows it to recover 5 hp each turn under normal conditions.
Thick hide provides an additional boost to its Armor Class.
Access to various druid spells bolstered by its spellcasting level.
Can cast several high-impact spells including Dispel Magic and Sleet Storm.
spellcasting: An 8th-level spellcaster with access to a variety of druid spells, focusing on healing, area control, and enhancing allies.
